name: Essential Oil Candle
description:
- All-natural candles provide an alternative to synthetic fragrance oils. 

- We use only high quality essential oils and natural wicks. 

- Soy is a clean-burning renewable resource. Soy will create a full wax pool, eliminating the common 'tunneling' of candles, which leaves wasted wax around the edges. Soy is water-soluble, making clean-up easy, so your handcrafted ceramic tumbler can be safely reused.

- Lavender: our lavender candle is crafted with pure lavender essential oil. This oil has a highly fragrant floral, herbaceous scent; filling space with a fresh floral aroma.

- Lemongrass: a popular Asian herb, is popular for it's earthy, citrus aroma. The strong throw of this candle will provide a simple touch of clean fragrant notes to any room. 

This candle is a collaboration with Gina DeSantis Ceramics.  Each container is made from porcelain clay and may vary slightly from the photo because they are handcrafted.

They measure approximately 3 inches in height and width.

Find out more about Gina DeSantis Ceramics at http://ginadesantisceramics.com/

name: Incense
description:
Our scented incense are hand dipped and allowed to soak for a minimum of 72 hours.

This is for a package of 20, 11" sticks packed in a seal-able plastic bag so it will continue to stay as fresh as the day it arrives.

name: Room Spray
description: Each spray contains 4 fluid oz in an amber bottle. To freshen the air in any room, shake well and spritz into air for a lingering scent.  May also be sprayed on linens or clothing to freshen. Recommended you test in an inconspicuous place before fully spraying on any item.
